Metrics plugin API Reference

Packages
net.sourceforge.metrics.builder  
net.sourceforge.metrics.calculators Contains the core calculators implementing the <calculator> extension
net.sourceforge.metrics.core The core metrics plugin classes, main plugin class, metrics classes and framework
net.sourceforge.metrics.core.sources The classes in this package form wrappers around the IJavaElement hierarchy adding storage room for metrics and collaborations with the calculation, persistence and export frameworks.
net.sourceforge.metrics.internal.persistence  
net.sourceforge.metrics.internal.prevayler  
net.sourceforge.metrics.internal.prevayler.implementation  
net.sourceforge.metrics.internal.tests  
net.sourceforge.metrics.internal.xml  
net.sourceforge.metrics.propagators These are "automatic" calculators.
net.sourceforge.metrics.ui These are the main metrics view ui classes
net.sourceforge.metrics.ui.dependencies  
net.sourceforge.metrics.ui.preferences This package contains all classes related to the preference pages for the metrics plugin
